title: Ambient Video Game Music - Blizzards 2
description: A second wave of meticulously constructed sounds, perfect for game developers who want to continue their exploration of the frosty tempests that winter can unleash.
longDescription:
Delighted to introduce the sequel to our Blizzard Ambience Pack â€“ a second wave of meticulously constructed sounds, perfect for game developers who want to continue their exploration of the frosty tempests that winter can unleash.


This follow-up collection deepens your audio resources, offering 10 additional blizzard-themed packs. Each pack expands on the chilling beauty of winter, blending the piercing howl of icy winds and the rhythmic patter of freezing rain into an evocative soundscape. As with its predecessor, the ensemble is brought together by a gentle, harmonic soundtrack, further tying the elements of the storm into a cohesive, immersive auditory experience.


However, this follow-up pack doesn't simply re-tread familiar snow. It brings new nuances to the blizzard theme, capturing the more subtle and rare sounds of winter weather. You'll find the quiet murmur of snowflakes settling, the creak of ice-laden branches, and the eerie quiet that descends upon the world during the heart of a snowstorm.


This sequel is an essential extension to your audio library, amplifying the possibilities for creating winter-themed gaming experiences. It offers a fresh perspective on winter's powerful beauty, seamlessly blending raw nature and musical harmony to echo the captivating, ever-changing moods of a blizzard. Immerse your players even deeper into the frosty unknown, where every gust and drift tells a unique story of winter's majesty.


This pack contains 10 tracks that are each 3 minutes long for a total 30 minutes of audio


--

Do you want to add an extra layer of immersion to your games?


Then check out our ambient video game music collections! These soundtracks will help transport you to different worlds, alien planets, frozen tundra's, Japan & hundreds of other scenarios and locations, adding an extra level of realism and excitement to your gameplay. Whether you are a game developer looking for high-quality sounds to use in your new games or breath life into some existing projects, our music collections are perfect for you!


--


We also have a number of other music collections and bundles available for sale at our publisher page, click here to check out our catalogue.
